fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP equal to 16.2%/17.7%/19.2% of Attack + 490/631/788 and remove 1 random debuff. When a debuff is removed, restore HP by an additional 10.8%/11.8%/12.8% of Attack + 326/420/525.
fixed_skill.name: Immaculate

innate_skill.desc: Cure Dizzy, Sleep, or Forget on 1 ally.
innate_skill.name: Patra

innate_skill.desc: Cure Burn, Freeze, Shock, or Windswept on 1 ally.
innate_skill.name: Baisudi

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 12%. When allies with no debuffs take damage, increase Defense by 26%.
passive_skill.name: Spiritual Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 12%. When allies with no debuffs take damage, increase Defense by 29%.
passive_skill.name: Spiritual Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 12%. When allies with no debuffs take damage, increase Defense by 32%. After dealing damage, increase Attack by 5.5%.
passive_skill.name: Spiritual Protection II

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
